scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.test:integration:mysql57: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mysql57 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:mysql8: npm run lint && cross-env DB=mysql8 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:maria1003: npm run lint && cross-env DB=maria1003 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:maria1011: npm run lint && cross-env DB=maria1011 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:sqlite: npm run lint && cross-env DB=sqlite jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:postgres11: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres11 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:postgres15: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres15 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:sqlsrv17: npm run lint && cross-env DB=sqlsrv17 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:integration:sqlsrv22: npm run lint && cross-env DB=sqlsrv22 jest --runInBand --modulePathIgnorePatterns '<rootDir>/src/__tests__/code/' --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.db:up: npm run sqlite:up && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d mysql57 mysql8 postgres11 postgres15 sqlsrv17 sqlsrv22 maria1003 maria1011 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up waitmysql57 waitmysql8 waitpostgres11 waitpostgres15 waitsqlsrv17 waitsqlsrv22 waitmaria1003 waitmaria1011
scripts.db:down: npm run sqlite:down && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v
